extendedInfo.description: Arkadios is a once-proud Greek warrior that now finds himself enslaved by the Romans. Now he dreams of only one thing: revenge. Heâll cut the head from his captor, even if he has to chop a gory-swath through an arena full of gladiators just to get there.
